articles.description: Trent Alexander-Arnold leaves Liverpool as a modern great - but there will be fans hurt by his decision, says BBC chief football writer Phil McNulty.

articles.description: Jannik Sinner says it was "good news" for him personally not to miss any Grand Slam tournaments during his three-month doping ban.

articles.title: Scottie Scheffler and Bryson DeChambeau wins raise US PGA Championship excitement levels

articles.description: Gérald Darmanin admitted it was a "mistake" to point the finger at Liverpool fans for the security breakdown at the 2022 final.
articles.title: French minister apologises to Liverpool fans over Champions League chaos

articles.description: Stephen Curry says the Golden State Warriors had to "dig deep" to beat the Houston Rockets 103-89 in their Western Conference play-off decider.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Stephen Curry's Golden State Warriors beat Houston Rockets

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says a double controversy over team orders at Ferrari during the Miami Grand Prix was triggered because he has "still got fire in my belly".
articles.title: Miami Grand Prix: Lewis Hamilton says 'fire in my belly' led to Ferrari team orders controversy

articles.description: Harry Kane has spent his whole career fighting to win silverware, this is how he finally did it with Bayern Munich at the age of 31.
articles.title: Harry Kane: Humble, popular, ruthless... how England captain won first trophy at Bayern Munich
